cursorHeadline: So nice to have you here!
cursor: Move your cursor on top of an image to get more information.
cv.intro: I am an inspirational and easily inspired social team player. As a mix of UI/UX-designer and service designer, I develop purposeful, elegant and easy-to-use digital services.{br}I graduated as a Master of Science (Technology) in spring 2024 after studying Information Networks at Aalto University, majoring in Business and Organisational Design. I have a broad understanding of IT and tools to solve complex problems and quickly learn and analyse new information.{br}I am fascinated by human behaviour, creative problem solving and facilitation. I would like to develop and explore these interests in my career. My main strengths are logical thinking, social skills and attention to detail. I am empathetic and I engage in new projects full heartedly.{br}In my free time, I love to adventure in nature. I tour Europe in my self-built campervan Vanda, and I ski, climb and hike. I also love board games and reading. Indeed, my own projects currently range from developing a board game to writing a fantasy novel.
cv.taitoDesc: As an UI/UX designer I participated in the design process for various digital products, ensuring a seamless user experience and an intuitive interface. My role involved drawing UI, wireframing, prototyping, and design sprinting to iterate and refine designs.
cv.thesisDesc: I worked as a Masters Researcher in the research group CRAI-CIS conducting qualitative research and interviews as part of my thesis on visual disinformation in Finnish news media. Through this study, I gained valuable insights into the complexities of visual disinformation and its impact on society.
cv.subrosaDesc: I worked in UI/UX-design, visual design, optimisation of user experience, graphical design and defining product requirements. As the only designer of the team, I have refined the visual look of projects as well as designed functionalities and requirements for systems.
cv.NAPCONDesc: Front-end programming and UI-design in a scrum-team. I also helped the marketing team by making websites, usage analysis and doing growth hacking. My skills in programming, data visualisation and remote team work were developed.
cv.juniorDesc: I taught and assisted workshops focusing on science, technology and art for student groups visiting Aalto University. I also created graphical designs and marketing materials for Aalto Junior. I developed new workshops and enhanced the existing ones, ensuring relevance, engagement, and educational value for participants.
cv.siemensDesc: I designed (UI/UX) an in house IoT application and participated in implementing it. I designed an ICT Service Portfolio and helped develop an IoT platform called MindSphere.
cv.ultraDesc: Projects in UI and UX design in desktop and mobile.
cv.churchDesc: I worked as teacher and instructor in many different confirmation camps. I was responsible for camp magazines (editor in chief and editing the final version) as well as photography during camps. I was in charge of guiding the group leaders (isonen) and I participated in creating content for lessons and for other activities.
cv.infoDesc: The Information Networks programme applies problem-based learning and collaborative group work, often conducted in real-life projects with companies and other organisations. I graduated as Bachelor of Science in 2020 and Master of Science in spring 2024 with excellent grades. Focus area in my masters was business and organisational design.
cv.usmbDesc: I studied a minor from Information Management in France. Around half of my studies were in french.
cv.norssiDesc: 90 courses, average of 9. Matriculation examination: Mathematics, advanced syllabus (E), Finnish (E), English (E), Physics (C), Chemistry (E) and Psychology (E).
cv.skillListProcess: User research and user testing{br}Wireframing and prototyping{br}User interface design{br}Design thinking{br}Information visualisation{br}
cv.skillListProgramming: HTML, CSS, React, Angular, JS, Python, Scala, Sass, MySQL{br}
cv.skillListOther: Certified Scrum Master{br}Tactic and strategic thinking (e.g. 1st place in Finnish Championships of Board Games 2023 & 2024){br}Leading and facilitating (e.g. Editor-in-Chief of Veikko 2015-2017){br}Project scheduling, planning and prioritising (e.g. the self-built campervan Vanda){br}Marketing (eg. Bachelor’s thesis on subject)
